) is a small, almost uninhabited bay on the northwest side of
. For those looking to escape the crowds bask in nature. There are no shops here and only four buildings on the entire bay including one villa for rent.
The best way to explore Thonglang is to hire a motorbike.

value: content=Two villas on the secluded bay. Views out to Ko Tao and Ko Ma. Swimming pool, sundeck, and large grounds. Each villa has two bedrooms with en suite baths, kitchen, lounge and covered patio.

content=Nice views over the Gulf of Thailand. Good selection of various accommodation available; from standard rooms to modern Western-style bungalows. All come with air conditioning, hot water, minibar, shower or bath and some even with a Jacuzzi, plus UBC cable TV and personal DVD player.
